Raw Hide Shield

shield (lvl 0)

item id [id]: 148
armor id [armor]: 235 (Magic Leather Shield)
protection, shield [protshield]: 13
parry [parry]: 4

Requires 5N to forge (N1)

This shield is made from the hides of exceptional bulls. The shield is not as sturdy as a good iron shield, but it is very light and doesn't encumber its bearer. The Raw Hide Shield is often used by mages.
